questions.flashCardBack: each mistake is a positive lesson
questions.questionText: When you are in your twenties...

answers.answer: each mistake is a positive lesson
it's better if you're never wrong
to be mistaken is a failure

questions.flashCardBack: be an entrepreneur in a big company
questions.questionText: When you're almost in your thirties you should...

answers.answer: be an entrepreneur in a big company
learn the process of how a big company runs
get in touch with the passion transmitted by small companies

questions.flashCardBack: think vertically that you're working for yourself
questions.questionText: Between your forties and your fifties you should...

answers.answer: learn new thinks and get involved in the new generations
think vertically that you're working for yourself
